text: Choosing Dr Lau Chee Chong for my dad's hearing problem was the right decision. He was able to perform detailed tests to assess his level of hearing loss and provide an appropriate solution.

I was impressed by how quickly Dr Lau diagnosed my condition without needing extensive tests. His clear explanation of the diagnosis and treatment made me feel well taken care of, and I am already feeling better too. Thank you, Dr Lau!

Dr Lau quickly identified the cause of my vertigo without having me go through a slew of tests. He clearly explained his diagnosis and treatment plan to me, and this reassured me a lot. Thank you, Dr Lau!

Amazing doctor, thorough, professional, warm and caring. Really appreciated his gentle treatments, and the way he takes the time to take full history and give very clear explanations. My whole family is treated by Dr Lau and we are all delighted. My two nephews had operations by him and the surgery was a great success in both cases. I was treated by him for quinsy in the hospital and my recovery was smooth and complete. Thank you Dr Lau and team

My persistent ear issue was recently treated by Dr.  Lau. His expertise and care were excellent. He took the time to thoroughly explain my condition and treatment options, making me feel at ease throughout the process. Thanks to Dr. Lau's treatment, my ear issue has improved significantly. I recommend him to anyone seeking an ENT specialist.
